tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories update_history --history_id "$history_id"
#if $annotation --annotation "$annotation" #end if #if $deleted --deleted "$deleted" #end if #if $importable --importable "$importable" #end if #if $name --name "$name" #end if #if $published --published "$published" #end if #if $purged --purged "$purged" #end if #if $tags --tags "$tags" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: annotation
input.help: Replace history annotation with given string

input.name: deleted
input.help: Mark or unmark history as deleted

input.name: importable
input.help: Mark or unmark history as importable

input.name: name
input.help: Replace history name with the given string

input.name: published
input.help: Mark or unmark history as published

input.name: purged
input.help: If True, mark history as purged (permanently deleted). Ignored on Galaxy release_15.01 and earlier

input.name: tags
input.help: Replace history tags with the given list

tool.help: Update history metadata information. Some of the attributes that can be modified are documented below.
